BioLib  3.1.1
A GUI-less version of Bio .NET library for editing & annotating various microscopy image formats.

◆ AutoThreshold() [2/2]

static void BioLib.BioImage.AutoThreshold ( BioImage b,
bool updateImageStats )
static

It takes a BioImage object, and calculates the mean histogram for each channel, and for the entire image.

The BioImage object is a class that contains a list of buffers, each of which contains a byte array of pixel data.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for each buffer, and stores it in the buffer's stats property.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for each channel, and stores it in the channel's stats property.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for the entire image, and stores it in the image's statistics property.

The mean histogram is calculated by adding up the histograms of each buffer, and then dividing by the number of buffers.

The histogram is calculated by looping through the byte array of pixel data, and incrementing the value of the histogram at the index of the pixel value.

The histogram

Parameters
BioImageThis is the image object that contains the image data.
updateImageStatsif true, the image stats will be updated.

Definition at line 9215 of file Bio.cs.

9216 {
9217 bstats = b;
9218 Statistics statistics = null;
9219 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9220 statistics = new Statistics(true);
9221 else
9222 statistics = new Statistics(false);
9223 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
9224 {
9225 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
9226 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
9227 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9228 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
9229 else
9230 {
9231 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
9232 {
9233 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
9234 }
9235 }
9236 }
9237 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
9238 {
9239 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
9240 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
9241 {
9242 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9243 {
9244 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
9245 }
9246 else
9247 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
9248 }
9249 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
9250 {
9251 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
9252 {
9253 int ind;
9254 if(b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
9255 {
9256 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, 0, t);
9257 }
9258 else
9259 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, t);
9260 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9261 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
9262 else
9263 {
9264 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
9265 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
9266 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
9267 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
9268 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
9269 }
9270 }
9271 }
9272 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
9273 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
9274 else
9275 {
9276 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
9277 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
9278 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
9279 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
9280 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
9281 }
9282 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
9283 }
9284 statistics.MeanHistogram();
9285 b.statistics = statistics;
9286 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), true, b, updateImageStats);
9287 }

Parameters

◆ CalculateFocusQuality()

static long BioLib.BioImage.CalculateFocusQuality ( Bitmap b)
static

The function calculates the focus quality of a given bitmap image.

Parameters
BitmapA class representing a bitmap image, which contains information about the image's size, pixel data, and color channels.
Returns
The method is returning a long value which represents the calculated focus quality of the input Bitmap image.

Definition at line 9340 of file Bio.cs.

9341 {
9342 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9343 {
9344 long sum = 0;
9345 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
9346 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9347 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9348 {
9349 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9350 sum += pixel.R;
9351 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
9352 }
9353 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9354 }
9355 else
9356 {
9357 long sum = 0;
9358 long sumOfSquares = 0;
9359 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9360 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9361 {
9362 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9363 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
9364 sum += p;
9365 sumOfSquares += p * p;
9366 }
9367 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),true,b);
9368 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9369 }
9370 }

◆ ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff()

static Bitmap BioLib.BioImage.ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff ( BioImage b,
int x,
int y,
int width,
int height,
int level )
static

The function ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff takes a BioImage object, coordinates, width, height, and resolution as input, and returns a Bitmap object representing the extracted region from the tiled TIFF image.

Parameters
BioImageThe BioImage object represents an image file that contains multiple pages or resolutions. It contains information about the image file, such as the file path, the number of pages, and the format of each page.
xThe x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the region to extract from the tiled TIFF image.
yThe parameter "y" represents the starting y-coordinate of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
widthThe width parameter represents the width of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
heightThe height parameter represents the height of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
resThe parameter "res" represents the resolution level of the tiled TIFF image. It is used to specify the level of detail or zoom level at which the image is being extracted.
Returns
The method is returning a Bitmap object.

Definition at line 7004 of file Bio.cs.

7005 {
7006 try
7007 {
7008 // Validate inputs
7009 if (b == null) throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(b));
7010 if (b.vipPages == null || b.vipPages.Count <= level) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid image level.");
7011
7012 // Extract the region from the specified level
7013 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[level].ExtractArea(x, y, width, height);
7014
7015 // Convert the NetVips.Image to Bitmap
7016 Bitmap bitmap = ConvertVipsImageToBitmap(subImage, b.bitsPerPixel);
7017
7018 // Clean up
7019 subImage.Dispose();
7020
7021 return bitmap;
7022 }
7023 catch (Exception ex)
7024 {
7025 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}\n{ex.StackTrace}");
7026 return null;
7027 }

◆ FilesToStack()

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.FilesToStack ( string[] files,
int sizeZ,
int sizeC,
int sizeT )
static

It takes a list of files, and creates a new BioImage object with the first file in the list. Then it loops through the rest of the files, adding the buffers from each file to the new BioImage object. Finally, it updates the coordinates of the new BioImage object, and adds it to the Images list.

Parameters
filesan array of file paths
sizeZnumber of slices in the stack
sizeCnumber of channels
sizeTnumber of time points
Returns
A BioImage object.

6900 {

6902 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6903 }
6904 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
6905 Images.AddImage(b);
6906 return b;
6907 }

◆ FindFocus()

static int BioLib.BioImage.FindFocus ( BioImage im,
int Channel,
int Time )
static

The function finds the focus of a given BioImage at a specific channel and time by calculating the focus quality of each Z-plane and returning the coordinate with the highest focus quality.

Parameters
BioImageA BioImage object that contains the image data.
ChannelThe channel of the BioImage to analyze. A BioImage can have multiple channels, each representing a different fluorescent label or imaging modality.
TimeThe time point at which the focus is being calculated.
Returns
an integer value which represents the coordinate of the image with the highest focus quality in a given channel and time.

Definition at line 9313 of file Bio.cs.

9314 {
9315 long mf = 0;
9316 int fr = 0;
9317 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
9318 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
9319 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
9320 {
9321 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time)]);
9322 dt.Add(f);
9323 if (f > mf)
9324 {
9325 mf = f;
9326 fr = im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time);
9327 }
9328 }
9329
9330 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, im, Channel, Time);
9331 return fr;
9332 }

6803 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6804 }
6805 }
6806 bm.sizeZ = shape[0];
6807 bm.sizeC = 1;
6808 }
6809 else if (shape.Length == 2)
6810 {
6811 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6812 {
6813 float[,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<float, float[,]>(data, shape);
6814 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[0], shape[1], PixelFormat.Float);
6815 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6816 {
6817 for (int x = 0; x < shape[0]; x++)
6818 {
6819 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[x, y]);
6820 }
6821 }
6822 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6823 }
6824 else if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6825 {
6826 uint[,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<uint, uint[,]>(data, shape);
6827 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[0], shape[1], PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);
6828 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6829 {
6830 for (int x = 0; x < shape[0]; x++)
6831 {
6832 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[x, y]);
6833 }
6834 }
6835 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6836 }
6837 bm.sizeC = 1;
6838 bm.sizeZ = 1;
6839 }
6840 else
6841 {
6842 throw new InvalidOperationException("Unsupported array shape.");
6843 }
6844
6845 for (int i = 0; i < bm.SizeC; i++)
6846 {
6847 if (bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.UInt || bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Int)
6848 bm.Channels.Add(new Channel(i, 32, 1));
6849 else
6850 if (bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6851 bm.Channels.Add(new Channel(i, 8, 1));
6852 }
6853 bm.sizeT = 1;
6854 bm.Coords = new int[bm.SizeZ, bm.SizeC, bm.SizeT];
6855 bm.UpdateCoords();
6856 bm.bitsPerPixel = 8;
6857 if(dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6858 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Float, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6859 else
6860 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt32)
6861 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.UInt, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6862 else
6863 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Int32)
6864 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Int, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6865 else
6866 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6867 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6868 foreach (var item in bm.Buffers)
6869 {
6870 item.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(item);
6871 }
6872 bm.Type = ImageType.stack;
6873 bm.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(bm.StageSizeX, bm.StageSizeY, bm.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(bm.PhysicalSizeX * bm.SizeX, bm.PhysicalSizeY * bm.SizeY, bm.PhysicalSizeZ * bm.SizeZ));
6874 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
6875 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6876 bm.StackThreshold(true);
6877 else
6878 bm.StackThreshold(false);
6879 bm.StackOrder = Order.ZCT;
6880 bm.ID = Path.GetFileName(file);
6881 bm.file = file;
6882 Images.AddImage(bm);
6883 return bm;
6884 }

The function "GetBands" returns the number of color bands for a given pixel format in the AForge library.

Parameters
PixelFormatThe PixelFormat parameter is an enumeration that represents the format of a pixel in an image. It specifies the number of bits per pixel and the color space used by the pixel. The PixelFormat enumeration is defined in the AForge.Imaging namespace.
Returns
The method is returning the number of color bands for a given pixel format.

It takes a byte array of RGB or RGBA data and converts it to a Bitmap.

hheight of the image

btsthe byte array of the image

Definition at line 5003 of file Bio.cs.

5004 {
5005 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
5006 {
5007 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5008 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5009 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5010 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5011 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5012 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5013 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5014 {
5015 //getting the pixels of current row
5016 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5017 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
5018 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5019 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5020 {
5021 int indexRGB = x * 4;
5022 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5023 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
5024 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
5025 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
5026 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
5027 }
5028 }
5029 //unlocking bits and disposing image
5030 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5031 return bmp;
5032 }
5033 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
5034 {
5035 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5036 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5037 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5038 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5039 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5040 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5041 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5042 {
5043 //getting the pixels of current row
5044 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5045 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
5046 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5047 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5048 {
5049 int indexRGB = x * 3;
5050 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5051 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
5052 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
5053 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
5054 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
5055 }
5056 }
5057 //unlocking bits and disposing image
5058 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5059 return bmp;
5060 }
5061 else
5062 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
5063 {
5064 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5065 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5066 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5067 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5068 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5069 unsafe
5070 {
5071 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5072 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5073 {
5074 //getting the pixels of current row
5075 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5076 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
5077 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5078 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5079 {
5080 int indexRGB = x * 6;
5081 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5082 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
5083 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
5084 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
5085 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5086 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5087 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
5088 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
5089 }
5090 }
5091 }
5092 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5093 return bmp;
5094 }
5095 else
5096 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
5097 {
5098 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5099 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5100 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5101 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5102 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5103 unsafe
5104 {
5105 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5106 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5107 {
5108 //getting the pixels of current row
5109 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5110 int rowRGB = y * w;
5111 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5112 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5113 {
5114 int indexRGB = x;
5115 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5116 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
5117 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5118 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5119 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
5120 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
5121 }
5122 }
5123 }
5124 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5125 return bmp;
5126 }
5127 else
5128 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
5129 {
5130 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5131 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5132 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5133 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5134 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5135 unsafe
5136 {
5137 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5138 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5139 {
5140 //getting the pixels of current row
5141 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5142 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
5143 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5144 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5145 {
5146 int indexRGB = x * 2;
5147 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5148 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
5149 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5150 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5151 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
5152 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
5153 }
5154 }
5155 }
5156 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5157 return bmp;
5158 }
5159
5160 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
5161 }

8045 if (bt == 8)
8046 return 255;
8047 if (bt == 9)
8048 return 512;
8049 else if (bt == 10)
8050 return 1023;
8051 else if (bt == 11)
8052 return 2047;

8054 return 4095;

8056 return 8191;

8058 return 16383;

8060 return 32767;
8061 else
8062 return 65535;

◆ GetBitsPerPixel()

static int BioLib.BioImage.GetBitsPerPixel ( int bt)
static

‍If the number is less than or equal to 255, then it's 8 bits. If it's less than or equal to 512, then it's 9 bits. If it's less than or equal to 1023, then it's 10 bits. If it's less than or equal to 2047, then it's 11 bits. If it's less than or equal to 4095, then it's 12 bits. If it's less than or equal to 8191, then it's 13 bits. If it's less than or equal to 16383, then it's 14 bits. If it's less than or equal to 32767, then it's 15 bits. If it's less than or equal to 65535, then it's 16 bits

Parameters
btThe number of bits per pixel.
Returns
The number of bits per pixel.

Definition at line 8017 of file Bio.cs.

8018 {
8019 if (bt <= 255)
8020 return 8;
8021 if (bt <= 512)
8022 return 9;
8023 else if (bt <= 1023)
8024 return 10;
8025 else if (bt <= 2047)
8026 return 11;
8027 else if (bt <= 4095)
8028 return 12;
8029 else if (bt <= 8191)
8030 return 13;
8031 else if (bt <= 16383)
8032 return 14;
8033 else if (bt <= 32767)
8034 return 15;
8035 else
8036 return 16;
8037 }

◆ GetIndex()

int BioLib.BioImage.GetIndex ( int ix,
int iy )

‍GetIndex(x,y) = (y * stridex + x) * 2

The stridex is the width of the image in bytes.

The stridey is the height of the image in bytes.

Parameters
ixx coordinate of the pixel
iyThe y coordinate of the pixel
Returns
The index of the pixel in the array.

Definition at line 4671 of file Bio.cs.

4672 {
4673 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
4674 return 0;
4675 int stridex = SizeX;
4676 int x = ix;
4677 int y = iy;
4678 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4679 {
4680 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
4681 }
4682 else
4683 {
4684 return (y * stridex + x);
4685 }
4686 }

◆ GetPixelFormat() [1/2]

static PixelFormat BioLib.BioImage.GetPixelFormat ( int rgbChannelCount,
int bitsPerPixel )
static

If the bits per pixel is 8, then the pixel format is either 8bppIndexed, 24bppRgb, or 32bppArgb. If the bits per pixel is 16, then the pixel format is either 16bppGrayScale or 48bppRgb.

Parameters
rgbChannelCountThe number of channels in the image. For example, a grayscale image has 1 channel, a color image has 3 channels (red, green, blue).
bitsPerPixel8 or 16
Returns
The PixelFormat of the image.

Definition at line 8100 of file Bio.cs.

8101 {
8102 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
8103 {
8104 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8105 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
8106 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8107 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
8108 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
8109 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
8110 }
8111 else
8112 {
8113 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8114 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
8115 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8116 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
8117 }
8118 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
8119 }

◆ GetPixelFormat() [2/2]

static PixelFormat BioLib.BioImage.GetPixelFormat ( int rgbChannelCount,
ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px )
static

The function returns the appropriate PixelFormat based on the number of RGB channels and the pixel type.

Parameters
rgbChannelCountThe rgbChannelCount parameter represents the number of channels in the RGB color model. It can have a value of either 1 (for grayscale images) or 3 (for RGB color images).
pxThe parameter "px" is of type ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType. It represents the pixel type of the image, such as INT8, UINT8, INT16, or UINT16.
Returns
The method returns a PixelFormat value based on the input parameters.

Definition at line 8130 of file Bio.cs.

8131 {
8132 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8133 {
8134 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
8135 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
8136 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
8137 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
8138 }
8139 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8140 {
8141 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
8142 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
8143 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
8144 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
8145 }
8146 else
8147 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
8148 throw new InvalidDataException("RGBChannels Count of " + rgbChannelCount + " not supported.");
8149 }

4964 {
4965 int index = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, 0, coord.T);
4966 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
4967 {
4968 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
4969 {
4970 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4971 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4972 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
4973 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
4974 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4975 }
4976 else
4977 {
4978 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4979 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4980 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
4981 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
4982 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4983 }
4984 }
4985 else
4986 {
4987 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Short)
4988 {
4989 return Buffers[index].GetImageRGBA();
4990 }
4991 else
4992 return Buffers[index];
4993 }
4994 }

7917 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7918 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
7919 }
7920 }

7924 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();

7926 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
7927 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();

7929 if (tilex < 0)
7930 tilex = 0;
7931 if (tiley < 0)
7932 tiley = 0;

7934 tilex = SizeX;
7935 if (tiley >= SizeY)
7936 tiley = SizeY;
7937 int sx = tileSizeX;
7938 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
7939 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
7940 int sy = tileSizeY;
7941 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
7942 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
7943 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
7944 if (sx <= 1)
7945 return null;
7946 if (sy <= 1)
7947 return null;
7948 try
7949 {
7950 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(index, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
7951 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, new ZCT(), index, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
7952 }
7953 catch (Exception e)
7954 {
7955 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7956 return null;
7957 }
7958 }

◆ isOME()

static bool BioLib.BioImage.isOME ( string file)
static

If the file is a TIFF, check the ImageDescription tag for the string "OME-XML". If it's there, return true. If it's not a TIFF, return true. If it's a PNG, JPG, JPEG, or BMP, return false.

Parameters
filethe path to the image file
Returns
A boolean value.

Definition at line 6047 of file Bio.cs.

6048 {
6049 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
6050 {
6051 return true;
6052 }
6053 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
6054 {
6055 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
6056 string desc = "";
6057 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
6058 desc = f[0].ToString();
6059 image.Close();
6060 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
6061 return true;
6062 else
6063 return false;
6064 }
6065 if ((file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
6066 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
6067 {
6068 return false;
6069 }
6070 else return true;
6071 }

static IntRange BioLib.BioImage.MapIntRangeToByteRange ( IntRange ushortRange)
static

Definition at line 4849 of file Bio.cs.

4850 {
4851 // Ensure the range is valid
4852 if (ushortRange.Min < 0 || ushortRange.Max > ushort.MaxValue)
4853 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(nameof(ushortRange), "Range must be within 0 to ushort.MaxValue.");
4854
4855 // Map each value in the range
4856 int mappedMin = (int)((ushortRange.Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
4857 int mappedMax = (int)((ushortRange.Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
4858
4859 return new IntRange(mappedMin, mappedMax);
4860 }

◆ MergeChannels() [1/2]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.MergeChannels ( BioImage b2,
BioImage b )
static

This function takes two images and merges them together.

Parameters
BioImageThe image to be merged
BioImageThe image to be merged
Returns
A new BioImage object.

Definition at line 4330 of file Bio.cs.

4331 {
4332 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
4333 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
4334 res.series = b2.series;
4335 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
4336 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
4337 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
4338 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
4339 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
4340 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
4341 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
4342 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
4343 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
4344 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
4345 res.Resolutions.Add(b2.Resolutions[0]);
4346 res.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b2.SizeX,b2.SizeY,b2.SizeZ));
4347 int i = 0;
4348 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
4349 {
4350 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
4351 {
4352 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
4353 {
4354 if (i < b.ImageCount)
4355 {
4356 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
4357 int ind = b.GetFrameIndex(zi, 0, ti);
4358 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
4359 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[ind].Bytes, co, ind);
4360 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, ind);
4361 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
4362 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
4363 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
4364 if (anns.Count > 0)
4365 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
4366 }
4367 else
4368 {
4369 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
4370 int ind = b2.GetFrameIndex(zi, 0, ti);
4371 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
4372 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[ind].Bytes, co, ind);
4373 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, b.ImageCount + ind);
4374 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
4375 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
4376 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
4377 if (anns.Count > 0)
4378 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
4379 }
4380 i++;
4381 }
4382 }
4383 }
4384 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
4385 {
4386 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[ci].Copy());
4387 }
4388 for (int ci = 0; ci < b2.SizeC; ci++)
4389 {
4390 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
4391 }
4392 res.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
4393 if(res.Channels.Count > 1)
4394 res.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
4395 if (res.Channels.Count > 2)
4396 res.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
4397 Images.AddImage(res);
4398 res.imagesPerSeries = res.Buffers.Count;
4399 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
4400 do
4401 {
4402 Thread.Sleep(100);
4403 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4404 AutoThreshold(res, false);
4405 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4406 res.StackThreshold(true);
4407 else
4408 res.StackThreshold(false);
4409 return res;
4410 }

4474 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
4475 int ind = 0;
4476 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
4477 {
4478 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
4479 {
4480 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, 0)]);
4481 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
4482 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)

4484 m.OverlayImage = bm;
4485 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, i)]);
4486 }
4487 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
4488 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);

4490 ind++;
4491 }

4503 AutoThreshold(bi, false);

4505 bi.StackThreshold(true);
4506 else
4507 bi.StackThreshold(false);
4508 return bi;

◆ OpenFile() [4/4]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.OpenFile ( string file,
int series,
bool tab,
bool addToImages,
bool tile,
int tileX,
int tileY,
int tileSizeX,
int tileSizeY )
static

The OpenFile function opens a BioImage file, reads its metadata, and loads the image data into a BioImage object.

Parameters
fileThe file path of the bioimage to be opened.
seriesThe series parameter is an integer that specifies the series number of the image to open.
tabThe "tab" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the BioImage should be opened in a new tab or not. If set to true, the BioImage will be opened in a new tab. If set to false, the BioImage will be opened in the current tab.
addToImagesA boolean value indicating whether the BioImage should be added to the Images collection.
tileThe "tile" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the image should be opened as a tiled image or not. If set to true, the image will be opened as a tiled image. If set to false, the image will be opened as a regular image.
tileXThe tileX parameter is an integer that represents the starting X coordinate of the tile. It is used when opening a tiled image to specify the position of the tile within the image.
tileYThe tileY parameter is used to specify the starting Y coordinate of the tile when opening a tiled image. It determines the position of the tile within the image.
tileSizeXThe tileSizeX parameter is the width of each tile in pixels. It is used when opening a tiled TIFF image to specify the size of the tiles.
tileSizeYThe tileSizeY parameter is the height of each tile in pixels when the image is tiled.
Returns
The method is returning a BioImage object.

Definition at line 5708 of file Bio.cs.

5709 {
5710 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5711 vips = VipsSupport(file);
5712 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
5713 if (file.EndsWith(".npy"))
5714 return BioImage.FromNumpy(file);
5715 bool ome = isOME(file);

5740 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
5741 }

5743 {
5744 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5745 b.tifRead = image;
5746 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
5747 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
5748 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
5749 b.littleEndian = !image.IsBigEndian();
5750 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
5751 string desc = "";
5752
5753 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5754 desc = f[0].ToString();
5755 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
5756 b.sizeC = 1;
5757 b.sizeT = 1;
5758 b.sizeZ = 1;
5759 bool imagej = false;
5760 if (f != null && !tile)
5761 {
5762 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
5763 desc = f[0].ToString();
5764 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
5765 {
5766 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5767 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5768 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
5769 else
5770 b.sizeC = 1;
5771 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
5772 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
5773 else
5774 b.sizeZ = 1;
5775 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
5776 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
5777 else
5778 b.sizeT = 1;
5779 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
5780 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
5781 else
5782 b.frameInterval = 1;
5783 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
5784 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
5785 else
5786 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5787 imagej = true;
5788 }
5789 }
5790 int stride = 0;
5791 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5792 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
5793 {
5794 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5795 {
5796 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
5797 stride = SizeX * 2;
5798 }
5799 else
5800 {
5801 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
5802 stride = SizeX;
5803 }
5804 }
5805 else
5806 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
5807 {
5808 b.sizeC = 1;
5809 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5810 {
5811 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
5812 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
5813 }
5814 else
5815 {
5816 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
5817 stride = SizeX * 3;
5818 }
5819 }
5820 else
5821 {
5822 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
5823 stride = SizeX * 4;
5824 }
5825
5826 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5827 int index = 0;
5828 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5829 {
5830 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
5831 {
5832 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
5833 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5834 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5835 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5836 {
5837 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5838 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
5839 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
5840 ch.info = info;
5841 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5842 if (index == 0)
5843 {
5844 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5845 }
5846 else
5847 if (index == 1)
5848 {
5849 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5850 }
5851 else
5852 if (index == 2)
5853 {
5854 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5855 }
5856 index++;
5857 }
5858 }
5859 else
5860 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
5861 {
5862 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
5863 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5864 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5865 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5866 {
5867 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
5868 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
5869 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
5870 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
5871 }
5872 }
5873 else
5874 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5875 {
5876 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5877 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5878 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5879 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
5880 {
5881 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5882 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5883 }
5884 }
5885 }
5886 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5887 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
5888 {
5889 tileSizeX = 1920;
5890 tileSizeY = 1080;
5891 }
5892
5893 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
5894 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5895 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5896
5897 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
5898 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
5899 {
5900 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
5901 {
5902 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
5903 }
5904 }
5905
5906 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5907 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
5908 if (!imagej)
5909 b.sizeZ = pages;
5910 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
5911 bool inter = true;
5912 if (stride != str)
5913 inter = false;
5914 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
5915 if (tiled)
5916 {
5917 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
5918 if (vips)
5919 OpenVips(b);
5920 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
5921 {
5922 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
5923 {
5924 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
5925 {
5926 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, b.GetFrameIndex(z,c,t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5927 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
5928 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
5929 }
5930 }
5931 }
5932 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
5933 }
5934 else
5935 {
5936 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
5937 {
5938 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
5939
5940 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
5941 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
5942 {
5943 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
5944 offset += stride;
5945 }
5946 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5947 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
5948 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
5949 }
5950 }
5951 image.Close();
5952 b.UpdateCoords();
5953 }
5954 else
5955 {
5956 Gdk.Pixbuf pf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(file);
5957 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
5958 PixelFormat px = GetPixelFormat(pf.NChannels, pf.BitsPerSample);
5959 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(pf.Width, pf.Height,px,96 * (1/2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000,0,0,0));
5960 b.bitsPerPixel = pf.BitsPerSample;
5961 b.Buffers.Add(new Bitmap(pf.Width, pf.Height, pf.Width * pf.NChannels, px, pf.Pixels));
5962 b.Buffers.Last().ID = Bitmap.CreateID(file, 0);
5963 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
5964 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, b.RGBChannelCount));
5965 b.Coords = new int[1, 1, 1];
5966 b.sizeC = 1;
5967 b.sizeT = 1;
5968 b.sizeZ = 1;
5969 }
5970 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
5971 {
5972 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
5973 b.StageSizeX = 0;
5974 b.StageSizeY = 0;
5975 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
5976 }
5977 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
5978
5979 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
5980 if (ome)
5981 {
5982 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
5983 }
5984
5985 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
5986 do
5987 {
5988 Thread.Sleep(50);
5989 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5990 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5991 AutoThreshold(b, false);
5992 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5993 b.StackThreshold(true);
5994 else
5995 b.StackThreshold(false);
5996 if (addToImages)
5997 Images.AddImage(b);
5998 //pr.Close();
5999 //pr.Dispose();
6000 st.Stop();
6001 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
6002 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
6003 BioLib.Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
6004 return b;
6005 }

The function "OpenOME" opens a bioimage file in the OME format and returns the first image in the series.

◆ OpenOME() [3/3]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.OpenOME ( string file,
int serie,
bool tab,
bool addToImages,
bool tile,
int tilex,
int tiley,
int tileSizeX,
int tileSizeY,
bool useOpenSlide = true )
static

The function "OpenOME" opens a bioimage file, with options to specify the series, whether to display it in a tab, whether to add it to existing images, whether to tile the image, and the tile size.

Parameters
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path or name of the OME (Open Microscopy Environment) file that you want to open.
serieThe "serie" parameter is an integer that represents the series number of the image to be opened.
tabThe "tab" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the image should be opened in a new tab or not. If set to true, the image will be opened in a new tab. If set to false, the image will be opened in the current tab.
addToImagesThe "addToImages" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the opened image should be added to a collection of images. If set to true, the image will be added to the collection. If set to false, the image will not be added.
tileThe "tile" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether or not to tile the images. If set to true, the images will be tiled according to the specified tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, and tileSizeY parameters. If set to false, the images will not be tiled.
tilexThe parameter "tilex" is an integer that represents the starting x-coordinate of the tile.
tileyThe parameter "tiley" is used to specify the number of tiles in the y-direction when tiling the image.
tileSizeXThe tileSizeX parameter specifies the width of each tile in pixels when tiling the images.
tileSizeYThe tileSizeY parameter is the height of each tile in pixels when tiling the images.

The function "OpenOME" opens a bioimage file, with options to specify the series, whether to

Definition at line 7112 of file Bio.cs.

7113 {
7114 if (file == null || file == "")
7115 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
7116 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
7117 do
7118 {
7119 Thread.Sleep(10);
7120 } while (!initialized);
7121 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
7122 reader = new ImageReader();
7123 if (tileSizeX == 0)
7124 tileSizeX = 1920;
7125 if (tileSizeY == 0)
7126 tileSizeY = 1080;
7127 progFile = file;
7128 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
7129 b.Type = ImageType.stack;
7130 b.Loading = true;
7131 if (b.meta == null)
7132 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
7133 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7134 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
7135 if (cf != null)
7136 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
7137 if (cf != f)
7138 {
7139 reader.close();
7140 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7141 try
7142 {
7143 Status = "Opening file " + b.Filename;
7144 reader.setId(f);
7145 }
7146 catch (Exception e)
7147 {
7148 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7149 return null;
7150 }
7151 }
7152
7153 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
7154 reader.setSeries(serie);
7155 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
7156 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
7157 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
7158 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
7159 try
7160 {
7161 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
7162 }
7163 catch (Exception)
7164 {
7165 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
7166 }
7167
7168 b.id = file;
7169 b.file = file;
7170 int SizeX, SizeY;
7171 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
7172 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
7173 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
7174 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
7175 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
7176 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
7177 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
7178 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
7179 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
7180 b.imRead = reader;
7181 List<Resolution> ress = new List<Resolution>();
7182 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
7183 b.bitsPerPixel = 8;
7184 else
7185 b.bitsPerPixel = 16;
7186 b.series = serie;
7187 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
7188 if (vips)
7189 OpenVips(b);
7190 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
7191 int i = 0;
7192 int sumSamples = 0;
7193 while (true)
7194 {
7195 Status = "Reading channels.";
7196 bool def = false;
7197 try
7198 {
7199 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
7200 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, s);
7201 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
7202 {
7203 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
7204 sumSamples += s;
7205 def = true;
7206 b.Channels.Add(ch);
7207 }
7208 if (i == 0)
7209 {
7210 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
7211 }
7212 else
7213 if (i == 1)
7214 {
7215 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
7216 }
7217 else
7218 if (i == 2)
7219 {
7220 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
7221 }
7222 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
7223 if (!def)
7224 break;
7225 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
7226 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
7227 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
7228 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
7229 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
7230 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
7231 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
7232 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
7233 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
7234 {
7235 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
7236 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
7237 }
7238 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
7239 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
7240 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
7241 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
7242 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
7243 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
7244 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
7245 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
7246 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
7247 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
7248 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
7249 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
7250 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
7251 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
7252
7253
7254 }
7255 catch (Exception e)
7256 {
7257 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7258 if (!def)
7259 break;
7260 }
7261 i++;
7262 }
7263 try
7264 {
7265 if(b.meta.getObjectiveNominalMagnification(serie, 0) != null)
7266 {
7267 b.Magnification = b.meta.getObjectiveNominalMagnification(serie, 0).intValue();
7268 }
7269 }
7270 catch (Exception e)
7271 {
7272 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7273 }
7274
7275 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
7276 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
7277 {
7278 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
7279 }
7280 try
7281 {
7282 Status = "Reading wells.";
7283 int wells = b.meta.getWellCount(0);
7284 if (wells > 0)
7285 {
7286 b.Type = ImageType.well;
7287 b.Plate = new WellPlate(b);
7288 tile = false;
7289 }
7290 }
7291 catch (Exception e)
7292 {
7293 //This file is not a well plate.
7294 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7295 }
7296 if (reader.getResolutionCount() > 0)
7297 ress.AddRange(GetResolutions(b));
7298 Console.WriteLine("Done reading resolutions.");
7299 reader.setSeries(serie);
7300
7301 int pyramidCount = 0;
7302 int pyramidResolutions = 0;
7303 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
7304 Console.WriteLine("Determining pyramidal levels.");
7305 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
7306 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
7307 if (ress.Count > 1 && b.Type != ImageType.well)
7308 {
7309 if (ress[0].SizeX > ress[1].SizeX)
7310 {
7311 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
7312 tile = true;
7313 //We need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
7314 int? sr = null;
7315 for (int r = 0; r < ress.Count - 1; r++)
7316 {
7317 if (ress[r].SizeX > ress[r + 1].SizeX && ress[r].PixelFormat == ress[r + 1].PixelFormat)
7318 {
7319 if (sr == null)
7320 {
7321 sr = r;
7322 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
7323 }
7324 }
7325 else
7326 {
7327 if (ress[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == ress[r].PixelFormat)
7328 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
7329 sr = null;
7330 }
7331 }
7332 pyramidCount = prs.Count;
7333 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
7334 {
7335 pyramidResolutions += (prs[p].Item2 - prs[p].Item1) + 1;
7336 }
7337 if (prs[serie].Item2 == 0)
7338 {
7339 prs[serie] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[serie].Item1, b.seriesCount-1);
7340 }
7341 }
7342 }
7343 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
7344 {
7345 Console.WriteLine("Determining Label and Macro resolutions.");
7346 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
7347 {
7348 for (int r = prs[p].Item1; r < prs[p].Item2 + 1; r++)
7349 {
7350 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[r]);
7351 }
7352 }
7353 //If we have 2 resolutions that we're not added they are the label & macro resolutions so we add them to the image.
7354 if (ress.Count > b.Resolutions.Count)
7355 {
7356 b.LabelResolution = ress.Count - 1;
7357 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[ress.Count - 1]);
7358 b.MacroResolution = ress.Count - 2;
7359 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[ress.Count - 2]);
7360 }
7361 }
7362 if (b.Resolutions.Count == 0)
7363 b.Resolutions.AddRange(ress);
7364
7365 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
7366 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
7367 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
7368 {
7369 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
7370 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
7371 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7372 int scount = 1;
7373 try
7374 {
7375 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
7376 }
7377 catch (Exception e)
7378 {
7379 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7380 }
7381 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
7382 {
7383 Status = "Reading ROI " + (sc+1).ToString() + "/" + scount;
7384 string typ = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
7385 ROI an = new ROI();
7386 an.roiID = roiID;
7387 an.roiName = roiName;
7388 an.shapeIndex = sc;
7389 if (typ == "Point")
7390 {
7391 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
7392 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
7393 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7394 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7395 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
7396 an.coord = new ZCT();
7397 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
7398 if (nz != null)
7399 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7400 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
7401 if (nc != null)
7402 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7403 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
7404 if (nt != null)
7405 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7406 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
7407 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
7408 if (fl != null)
7409 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7410 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
7411 if (ff != null)
7412 an.family = ff.name();
7413 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7414 if (col != null)
7415 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7416 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7417 if (fw != null)
7418 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7419 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7420 if (colf != null)
7421 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7422 }
7423 else
7424 if (typ == "Line")
7425 {
7426 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
7427 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
7428 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7429 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7430 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7431 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7432 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
7433 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
7434 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
7435 if (nz != null)
7436 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7437 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
7438 if (nc != null)
7439 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7440 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
7441 if (nt != null)
7442 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7443 an.coord = co;
7444 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
7445 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
7446 if (fl != null)
7447 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7448 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
7449 if (ff != null)
7450 an.family = ff.name();
7451 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7452 if (col != null)
7453 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7454 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7455 if (fw != null)
7456 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7457 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
7458 if (colf != null)
7459 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7460 }
7461 else
7462 if (typ == "Rectangle")
7463 {
7464 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
7465 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
7466 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7467 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7468 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
7469 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
7470 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
7471 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
7472 if (nz != null)
7473 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7474 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
7475 if (nc != null)
7476 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7477 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
7478 if (nt != null)
7479 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7480 an.coord = co;
7481
7482 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
7483 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
7484 if (fl != null)
7485 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7486 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
7487 if (ff != null)
7488 an.family = ff.name();
7489 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
7490 if (col != null)
7491 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7492 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7493 if (fw != null)
7494 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7495 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
7496 if (colf != null)
7497 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7498 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
7499
7500 }
7501 else
7502 if (typ == "Ellipse")
7503 {
7504 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
7505 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
7506 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7507 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7508 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7509 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7510 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
7511 double w = ew * 2;
7512 double h = eh * 2;
7513 double x = px - ew;
7514 double y = py - eh;
7515 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
7516 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
7517 if (nz != null)
7518 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7519 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
7520 if (nc != null)
7521 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7522 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
7523 if (nt != null)
7524 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7525 an.coord = co;
7526 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
7527 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
7528 if (fl != null)
7529 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7530 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
7531 if (ff != null)
7532 an.family = ff.name();
7533 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
7534 if (col != null)
7535 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7536 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7537 if (fw != null)
7538 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7539 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
7540 if (colf != null)
7541 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7542 }
7543 else
7544 if (typ == "Polygon")
7545 {
7546 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
7547 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
7548 an.closed = true;
7549 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
7550 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7551 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
7552 if (pts.Length > 100)
7553 {
7554 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
7555 }
7556 an.AddPoints(pts);
7557 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
7558 if (nz != null)
7559 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7560 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
7561 if (nc != null)
7562 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7563 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
7564 if (nt != null)
7565 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7566 an.coord = co;
7567 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
7568 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
7569 if (fl != null)
7570 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7571 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
7572 if (ff != null)
7573 an.family = ff.name();
7574 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
7575 if (col != null)
7576 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7577 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7578 if (fw != null)
7579 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7580 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
7581 if (colf != null)
7582 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7583 }
7584 else
7585 if (typ == "Polyline")
7586 {
7587 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
7588 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
7589 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
7590 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7591 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
7592 {
7593 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
7594 }
7595 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
7596 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
7597 if (nz != null)
7598 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7599 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
7600 if (nc != null)
7601 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7602 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
7603 if (nt != null)
7604 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7605 an.coord = co;
7606 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
7607 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
7608 if (fl != null)
7609 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7610 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
7611 if (ff != null)
7612 an.family = ff.name();
7613 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7614 if (col != null)
7615 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7616 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7617 if (fw != null)
7618 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7619 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
7620 if (colf != null)
7621 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7622 }
7623 else
7624 if (typ == "Label")
7625 {
7626 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
7627 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
7628
7629 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
7630 if (nz != null)
7631 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7632 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
7633 if (nc != null)
7634 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7635 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
7636 if (nt != null)
7637 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7638 an.coord = co;
7639
7640 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
7641 if (fl != null)
7642 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7643 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
7644 if (ff != null)
7645 an.family = ff.name();
7646 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
7647 if (col != null)
7648 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7649 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7650 if (fw != null)
7651 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7652 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
7653 if (colf != null)
7654 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7655 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
7656 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
7657 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
7658 }
7659 else
7660 if (typ == "Mask")
7661 {
7662 byte[] bts = b.meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
7663 bool end = b.meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
7664 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, b.Resolutions[0].SizeX, b.Resolutions[0].SizeY,new PointD(b.StageSizeX,b.StageSizeY),b.PhysicalSizeX,b.PhysicalSizeY);
7665 an.Text = b.meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
7666 an.id = b.meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
7667 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
7668 if (nz != null)
7669 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7670 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
7671 if (nc != null)
7672 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7673 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
7674 if (nt != null)
7675 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7676 an.coord = co;
7677
7678 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
7679 if (fl != null)
7680 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7681 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
7682 if (ff != null)
7683 an.family = ff.name();
7684 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
7685 if (col != null)
7686 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7687 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7688 if (fw != null)
7689 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7690 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
7691 if (colf != null)
7692 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7693 }
7694 b.Annotations.Add(an);
7695 }
7696 }
7697
7698 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
7699 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
7700
7701 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
7702 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
7703 {
7704
7705 try
7706 {
7707
7708 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
7709 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
7710 {
7711 Status = "Opening file with OpenSlide.";
7712 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
7713 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file, true);
7714 }
7715 else
7716 {
7717 Status = "Opening file with BioFormats.";
7718 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
7719 }
7720 }
7721 catch (Exception e)
7722 {
7723 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7724 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
7725 }
7726 tile = true;
7727 }
7728 // read the image data bytes
7729 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
7730 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
7731 int z = 0;
7732 int c = 0;
7733 int t = 0;
7734 if (!tile)
7735 {
7736 Status = "Reading image planes.";
7737 try
7738 {
7739 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
7740 {
7741 Progress = ((float)p / (float)pages) * 100;
7742 Bitmap bf;
7743 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
7744 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
7745 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
7746 }
7747 }
7748 catch (Exception ex)
7749 {
7750 Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);
7751 }
7752
7753 }
7754 else
7755 {
7756 Status = "Reading tiles.";
7757 b.imRead = reader;
7758 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
7759 {
7760 Progress = ((float)p / (float)pages) * 100;
7761 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
7762 }
7763 }
7764 int pls;
7765 try
7766 {
7767 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
7768 }
7769 catch (Exception)
7770 {
7771 pls = 0;
7772 }
7773 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
7774 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
7775 {
7776 Plane pl = new Plane();
7777 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
7778 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
7779 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
7780 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7781 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
7782 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7783 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
7784 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7785 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
7786 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
7787 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
7788 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7789 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi) != null)
7790 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7791 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi) != null)
7792 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7793 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
7794 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
7795 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7796 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
7797 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7798 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
7799 }
7800 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
7801 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
7802 {
7803 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
7804 }
7805 string ord = reader.getDimensionOrder();
7806 if(ord == "XYZCT")
7807 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.ZCT);
7808 else if(ord == "XYCZT")
7809 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.CZT);
7810 else if (ord == "XYTCZ")
7811 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.TCZ);
7812 AutoThreshold(b, true);
7813 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7814 b.StackThreshold(true);
7815 else
7816 b.StackThreshold(false);
7817 try
7818 {
7819 if(!b.isPyramidal)
7820 reader.close();
7821 if (addToImages)
7822 Images.AddImage(b);
7823 }
7824 catch (Exception e)
7825 {
7826 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7827 }
7828 b.Loading = false;
7829 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, file, serie, tab, addToImages, tile, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
7830 return b;
7831 }
BioLib.BioImage.ToString
override string ToString()
This function returns the filename of the object, and the location of the object in the 3D space.
Definition Bio.cs:9392

◆ OpenOMEROIs()

static List< ROI > BioLib.BioImage.OpenOMEROIs ( string file,
int series )
static

It reads the OME-XML file and converts the ROIs to a list of ROI objects.

Parameters
filethe path to the OME-TIFF file
seriesthe series number of the image you want to open
Returns
A list of ROI objects.

Definition at line 8558 of file Bio.cs.

8618 int rc = meta.getROICount();

8752 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
8753 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();

8755 double w = ew * 2;
8756 double h = eh * 2;
8757 double x = px - ew;
8758 double y = py - eh;
8759 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);

8879 if (fl != null)
8880 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8881 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8882 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
8883 if (col != null)
8884 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8885 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8886 if (fw != null)
8887 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8888 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
8889 if (colf != null)
8890 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8891 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
8892 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8893 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
8894 }
8895 else
8896 if (type == "Mask")
8897 {
8898 byte[] bts = meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
8899 bool end = meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
8900 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, SizeX, SizeY, new PointD(stageSizeX, stageSizeY),physicalSizeX,physicalSizeY);
8901 an.Text = meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
8902 an.id = meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
8903 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
8904 if (nz != null)
8905 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8906 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
8907 if (nc != null)
8908 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8909 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
8910 if (nt != null)
8911 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8912 an.coord = co;
8913
8914 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
8915 if (fl != null)
8916 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8917 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
8918 if (ff != null)
8919 an.family = ff.name();
8920 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
8921 if (col != null)
8922 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8923 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8924 if (fw != null)
8925 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8926 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
8927 if (colf != null)
8928 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8929 }
8930 }
8931 }
8932
8933 imageReader.close();
8934 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series);
8935 return Annotations;
8936 }

8170 {

8176 }
8177 }

8187 if (bs[i] == null)
8188 return null;

5540 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
5541 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();

5543 if (f != null)
5544 {
5545 string desc = f[0].ToString();

5547 {
5548 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5549 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5550 count = imDesc.channels;
5551 }
5552 }

5554 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
5555 image.Close();

bool ome )
static

The SaveAsync function saves data to a file asynchronously.

Parameters
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path or name where the data will be saved.
idThe "id" parameter is a string that represents an identifier for the save operation. It could be used to uniquely identify the saved data or to specify a specific location or format for the saved file.
serieThe "serie" parameter is an integer that represents a series or sequence number. It is used as a parameter in the SaveAsync method.
omeThe "ome" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether or not to perform a specific action in the saving process.

static void BioLib.BioImage.SaveOMEPyramidal ( BioImage[] bms,
string file,
Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression,

static

The function SaveOMEPyramidal saves a collection of BioImages as a pyramidal OME-TIFF file.

Parameters
bmsAn array of BioImage objects representing the images to be saved.
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path where the OME Pyramidal TIFF file will be saved.
compressionThe compression parameter is of type Enums.ForeignTiffCompression and it specifies the compression method to be used when saving the TIFF file.

Definition at line 6518 of file Bio.cs.

6519 {
6520 if (File.Exists(file))
6521 File.Delete(file);
6522 Status = "Saving OME Pyramidal";
6523 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
6524 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
6525 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
6526 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6527 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6528 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
6529 {
6530 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
6531 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
6532 {
6533 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6534 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6535 {
6536 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6537 }
6538 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6539 {
6540 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6541 }
6542 }
6543 else
6544 {
6545 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
6546 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
6547 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
6548 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6549 {
6550 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6551 }
6552 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6553 {
6554 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6555 }
6556 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6557 }
6558 }
6559 int s = 0;
6560 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
6561 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
6562 int minx = int.MaxValue;
6563 int miny = int.MaxValue;
6564 double last = 0;
6565 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6566 {
6567 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
6568 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
6569 if (minx > xs)
6570 minx = xs;
6571 if (miny > ys)
6572 miny = ys;
6573 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
6574 last = px;
6575 }
6576 s = 0;
6577 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
6578 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
6579 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
6580 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
6581 NetVips.Image img = null;
6582 int ib = 0;
6583
6584 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6585 {
6586 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
6587 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
6588 c = 3;
6589 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
6590 met +=
6591 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
6592 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
6593 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
6594 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
6595 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
6596 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
6597 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
6598 int i = 0;
6599 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
6600 {
6601 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
6602 i++;
6603 }
6604 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
6605 ib++;
6606 }
6607 met += "</OME>";
6608 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6609 {
6610 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
6611 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
6612 int bands = GetBands(pf);
6613 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
6614 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
6615 else
6616 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
6617 int i = 0;
6618 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
6619 {
6620 Progress = ((float)i / (float)bis[px].Count) * 100;
6621 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
6622 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
6623 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
6624 NetVips.Image tile;
6625 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6626 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
6627 else
6628 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
6629 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
6630 i++;
6631 };
6632 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
6633 {
6634 // Set the ImageDescription tag
6635 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
6636 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
6637 });
6638 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
6639 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
6640 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
6641 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
6642 else
6643 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
6644 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
6645 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
6646 s++;
6647 }
6648
6649 }
