Definition Bio.cs:6491

◆ SaveOMESeries()

static void BioLib.BioImage.SaveOMESeries ( BioImage[] files,
string f,
bool planes )
static

This function takes a list of image files and saves them as a single OME-TIFF file.

Parameters
filesan array of file paths to the images to be saved
fthe file name to save to
planesif true, the planes will be saved as well.

6415 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
6416 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
6417 {
6418 //Correct order of parameters.

6420 {

6422 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);

6424 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
6425 {
6426 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
6427 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
6428 }
6429 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6430 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6431 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6432 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
6433 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
6434 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
6435 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
6436 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
6437 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
6438
6439 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
6440 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
6441 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
6442 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
6443 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
6444
6445 }
6446
6447 }
6448 writer = new ImageWriter();
6449 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
6450 try
6451 {
6452 Status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
6453 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6454 {
6455 Console.WriteLine("Writer setId: " + files[i]);
6456 writer.setId(f);
6457 BioImage b = files[i];
6458 progFile = files[i].Filename;
6459 writer.setSeries(i);
6460 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
6461 {
6462 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
6463 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
6464 Progress = ((float)bu / (float)b.Buffers.Count) * 100;
6465 }
6466 }
6467 if (!OperatingSystem.IsMacOS())
6468 {
6469 Console.WriteLine("Closing writer.");
6470 writer.close();
6471 }
6472 }
6473 catch (Exception e)
6474 {
6475 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6476 }
6477
6478 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, files, f, planes);
6479 }

◆ SavePyramidalAsync()

static async Task BioLib.BioImage.SavePyramidalAsync ( BioImage[] imgs,
string file,
Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com,
int compLevel )
static

The function SavePyramidalAsync saves an array of BioImage objects as a pyramidal TIFF file asynchronously.

Parameters
imgsimgs is an array of BioImage objects.
fileThe "file" parameter is a string that represents the file path where the pyramidal image will be saved.
comThe parameter "com" is of type Enums.ForeignTiffCompression, which is an enumeration representing different compression options for the TIFF file.
compLevelThe compLevel parameter is an integer that represents the compression level for the TIFF file. It is used to specify the level of compression to be applied to the image data when saving the pyramidal image. The higher the compression level, the smaller the file size but potentially lower image quality.

Definition at line 8482 of file Bio.cs.

8483 {
8484 bms = imgs;
8485 savefile = file;
8486 comp = com;
8487 compLev = compLevel;
8488 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
8489 }

5502 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
5503 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
5504 }
5505 else
5506 {
5507 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
5508 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
5509 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
5510 }
5511 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
5512 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
5513 // specify the page number
5514 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
5515 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
5516 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
5517 {
5518 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
5519 offset += stride;
5520 }
5521 image.WriteDirectory();
5522 im++;
5523 }
5524 }
5525 }
5526 }
5527 image.Dispose();

◆ StringToROI()

static ROI BioLib.BioImage.StringToROI ( string sts)
static

It takes a string and returns an ROI object.

Parameters
ststhe string that contains the ROI data
Returns
A ROI object.

Definition at line 8982 of file Bio.cs.

8983 {
8984 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
8985 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
8986 return null;
8987 ROI an = new ROI();
8988 string val = "";
8989 bool inSep = false;
8990 int col = 0;
8991 double x = 0;
8992 double y = 0;
8993 double w = 0;
8994 double h = 0;
8995 string line = sts;
8996 bool points = false;
8997 char sep = '"';
8998 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
8999 {
9000 char c = line[i];
9001 if (c == sep)
9002 {
9003 if (!inSep)
9004 {
9005 inSep = true;
9006 }
9007 else
9008 inSep = false;
9009 continue;
9010 }
9011
9012 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
9013 {
9014 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
9015 if (col == 0)
9016 {
9017 //ROIID
9018 an.roiID = val;
9019 }
9020 else
9021 if (col == 1)
9022 {
9023 //ROINAME
9024 an.roiName = val;
9025 }
9026 else
9027 if (col == 2)
9028 {
9029 //TYPE
9030 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
9031 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
9032 an.closed = true;
9033 }
9034 else
9035 if (col == 3)
9036 {
9037 //ID
9038 an.id = val;
9039 }
9040 else
9041 if (col == 4)
9042 {
9043 //SHAPEINDEX/
9044 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
9045 }
9046 else
9047 if (col == 5)
9048 {
9049 //TEXT/
9050 an.Text = val;
9051 }
9052 else
9053 if (col == 6)
9054 {
9055 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
9056 }
9057 else
9058 if (col == 7)
9059 {
9060 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
9061 }
9062 else
9063 if (col == 8)
9064 {
9065 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
9066 }
9067 else
9068 if (col == 9)
9069 {
9070 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
9071 }
9072 else
9073 if (col == 10)
9074 {
9075 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9076 }
9077 else
9078 if (col == 11)
9079 {
9080 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9081 }
9082 else
9083 if (col == 12)
9084 {
9085 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9086 }
9087 else
9088 if (col == 13)
9089 {
9090 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9091 }
9092 else
9093 if (col == 14)
9094 {
9095 //POINTS
9096 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
9097 points = false;
9098 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
9099 }
9100 else
9101 if (col == 15)
9102 {
9103 //STROKECOLOR
9104 string[] st = val.Split(',');
9105 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
9106 }
9107 else
9108 if (col == 16)
9109 {
9110 //STROKECOLORW
9111 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9112 }
9113 else
9114 if (col == 17)
9115 {
9116 //FILLCOLOR
9117 string[] st = val.Split(',');
9118 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
9119 }
9120 else
9121 if (col == 18)
9122 {
9123 //FONTSIZE
9124 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9125 an.fontSize = (float)s;
9126 an.family = "Times New Roman";
9127 }
9128 col++;
9129 val = "";
9130 }
9131 else
9132 val += c;
9133 }
9134
9135 return an;
9136 }

◆ Substack()

4286 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
4287 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
4288 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
4289 b.sizeT = te - ts;
4290 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
4291 {
4292 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
4293 {
4294 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
4295 {
4296 int ind = orig.GetFrameIndex(zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti);
4297 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
4298 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
4299 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
4300 b.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, i);
4301 i++;
4302 }
4303 }
4304 }
4305 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
4306 {
4307 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
4308 }
4309 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
4310 do
4311 {
4312 Thread.Sleep(100);
4313 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4314 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
4315 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
4316 AutoThreshold(b, false);
4317 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4318 b.StackThreshold(true);
4319 else
4320 b.StackThreshold(false);
4321 Images.AddImage(b);
4322 return b;
4323 }

◆ To16Bit()

void BioLib.BioImage.To16Bit ( )

Converts the image to 16 bit.

3492 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
3493 To24Bit();
3494 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3495 return;
3496 bitsPerPixel = 16;
3497 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3498 {
3499 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
3500 int index = 0;
3501 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3502 {
3503 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
3504 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
3505 bfs.AddRange(bs);
3506 index += 3;
3507 }
3508 Buffers = bfs;
3509 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
3510 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
3511 {
3512 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
3513 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
3514 c.range = new IntRange[1];
3515 Channels.Clear();
3516 Channels.Add(c);
3517 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
3518 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
3519 Channels[1].Index = 1;
3520 Channels[2].Index = 2;
3521 }
3522 }
3523 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3524 {
3525 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3526 {
3527 Buffers[i] = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
3528 }
3529 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
3530 {
3531 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
3532 {
3533 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3534 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3535 }
3536 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
3537 }
3538 bitsPerPixel = 16;
3539 }
3540 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3541 {
3542 To48Bit();
3543 To16Bit();
3544 }
3545 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float)
3546 {
3547 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3548 {
3549 if(Statistics.StackMax <= 1)
3550 Buffers[i].To16Bit(true);
3551 else
3552 Buffers[i].To16Bit(false);
3553 }
3554 }
3555
3556 foreach (var item in Buffers)
3557 {
3558 item.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(item);
3559 }
3560 AutoThreshold(this, true);
3561 StackThreshold(true);
3562 }

3621 bfs.Add(bbs);

3629 if (Channels.Count > 2)
3630 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);

3632 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3633 {
3634 if (bs[b] != null)
3635 bs[b].Dispose();
3636 bs[b] = null;
3637 }
3638 bfs.Add(bbs);
3639 }
3640 Buffers = bfs;
3641 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3642 }

◆ ToImageSpace() [2/5]

static PointD[] BioLib.BioImage.ToImageSpace ( List< PointD > p,
double stageSizeX,
double stageSizeY,
double physicalSizeX,
double physicalSizeY )
static

The function takes a list of points in stage space and converts them to image space using the provided stage and physical size parameters.

Parameters
pA list of PointD objects representing points in stage space.
stageSizeXThe width of the stage or canvas in pixels.
stageSizeYThe stageSizeY parameter represents the size of the stage or canvas in the Y-axis direction. It is used to calculate the Y-coordinate of each point in the p list in image space.
physicalSizeXThe physical size of the X-axis in the image space.
physicalSizeYThe physical size of the Y-axis in the coordinate system of the stage or image.
Returns
The method is returning an array of PointD objects.

Definition at line 8079 of file Bio.cs.

8080 {
8081 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
8082 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
8083 {
8084 PointD pp = new PointD();
8085 pp.X = ((p[i].X - stageSizeX) / physicalSizeX);
8086 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - stageSizeY) / physicalSizeY);
8087 ps[i] = pp;
8088 }
8089 return ps;
8090 }

◆ ToStageSpace() [1/7]

PointD BioLib.BioImage.ToStageSpace ( PointD p)

Parameters

Definition at line 4136 of file Bio.cs.

4137 {
4138 PointD pp = new PointD();

4140 {
4141 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
4142 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
4143 return pp;
4144 }

4148 pp.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);

◆ ToStageSpace() [2/7]

static PointD BioLib.BioImage.ToStageSpace ( PointD p,
double physicalSizeX,
double physicalSizeY,
double volumeX,
double volumeY )
static

‍The function takes a point in the volume space and converts it to a point in the stage space

Parameters
PointDA custom class that holds an X and Y coordinate.
physicalSizeXThe width of the stage in mm
physicalSizeYThe height of the stage in mm
volumeXThe X coordinate of the top left corner of the volume in stage space.

It takes a list of points, and converts them from a coordinate system where the origin is in the center of the image, to a coordinate system where the origin is in the top left corner of the image.

◆ VipsSupport()

static bool BioLib.BioImage.VipsSupport ( string file)
static

The function checks if a given file is supported by the Vips library and returns true if it is, false otherwise.

Parameters
fileThe "file" parameter is a string that represents the file path of the TIFF image that you want to load using the NetVips library.
Returns
The method is returning a boolean value. If the try block is executed successfully, it will return true. If an exception is caught, it will return false.

Definition at line 8511 of file Bio.cs.

8512 {
8513 try
8514 {
8515 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
8516 Settings.AddSettings("VipsSupport", "true");
8517 }
8518 catch (Exception e)
8519 {
8520 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
8521 return false;
8522 }
8523 netim.Close();
8524 netim.Dispose();
8525 return true;
8526 }

◆ Level

int BioLib.BioImage.Level
getset

Definition at line 2651 of file Bio.cs.

2652 {
2653 get
2654 {
2655 int l = 0;
2656 if (openslideBase != null)
2657 l = OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openslideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
2658 else
2659 if (slideBase != null)
2660 l = LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
2661 if (l < 0)
2662 return 0;
2663 return l;
2664 }
2665 set
2666 {
2667 if(Type == ImageType.well)
2668 {
2669 level = value;
2670 reader.setId(file);
2671 reader.setSeries(value);
2672 // read the image data bytes
2673 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
2674 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
2675 PixelFormat pf = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2676 int w = Buffers[0].SizeX; int h = Buffers[0].SizeY;
2677 Buffers.Clear();
2678 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
2679 {
2680 Bitmap bf;
2681 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
2682 bf = new Bitmap(file, w, h, pf, bytes, new ZCT(), p, null, littleEndian, inter);
2683 Buffers.Add(bf);
2684 }
2685 }
2686 }
2687 }
